text.name: rt_notify_active_policy
text.text: A new policy has been activated: %s

text.name: rt_notify_active_scheme
text.text: A new scheme has been activated: %s

text.name: rt_policy_reason_evaluation
text.text: %s points awarded during evaluation of policy %s

text.name: rt_header_no_selected_policy
text.text: Select an active policy to see relevant information

text.name: rt_header_no_report_information
text.text: There is no report information available. Check back later.

text.name: rt_header_scheme_equipment
text.text: The following equipment will be provided for the duration of the scheme:

text.name: rt_policy_description_sprayviolation
text.text: Penalizes farms for spraying near water

text.name: rt_policy_description_empty_food
text.text: Requires food to be present in animal pens.

text.name: rt_policy_description_empty_straw
text.text: Requires straw to be present in animal pens.

text.name: rt_policy_description_full_slurry
text.text: Requires slurry tanks not to be full.

text.name: rt_policy_description_animal_productivity
text.text: Requires animals to be kept in good conditions.

text.name: rt_policy_description_manure_spreading
text.text: You should not let manure sit idle indefinitely. Ensure you spread at least 50% of the manure you produce on a rolling basis. If you do not produce manure you will not be affected by this policy.

text.name: rt_policy_description_restricted_slurry
text.text: You are not allowed to apply slurry during the months of September to December. You will be penalized for each violation.

text.name: rt_policy_report_description_croprotation
text.text: The report shows totals for compliant and non-compliant land.

text.name: rt_policy_report_description_sprayviolation
text.text: The report shows how many spraying violations occurred in the last month.

text.name: rt_policy_report_description_empty_food
text.text: The report shows how many combined hours food was empty in animal pens.

text.name: rt_policy_report_description_empty_straw
text.text: The report shows how many combined hours straw was empty in animal pens.

text.name: rt_policy_report_description_full_slurry
text.text: The report shows how many combined hours slurry tanks were full.

text.name: rt_policy_report_description_animal_productivity
text.text: The report shows how many combined hours animals were unproductive.

text.name: rt_policy_report_description_animal_space
text.text: The report shows how many times insufficient space for animals was recorded.

text.name: rt_policy_report_description_manure_spreading
text.text: The report shows how actual vs expected manure spreading compliance rates.

text.name: rt_policy_report_description_restricted_slurry
text.text: The report shows how many times slurry was applied during the restricted months.

text.name: rt_scheme_desc_delayed_mowing
text.text: Do not cut your grass during the spring months (March to June) to protect wildlife. In July, you will be compensated for any uncut grass.

text.name: rt_scheme_desc_crop_promotion
text.text: A government initiative to promote the growth of %s through financial incentives. You may be provided equipment for the duration of the initiative and receive a financial bonus for each field where you plant the crop.

text.name: rt_scheme_desc_reduce_bale_wrapping
text.text: Wrapping bales consumes plastic and prevents the spread of seeds during transportation. This scheme does not punish you for wrapping bales - it only rewards you when you choose an alternative such as making hay bales or using a forage wagon.

text.name: rt_scheme_desc_tractor_demo
text.text: %s are offering your farm the opportunity to demo a %s for %s month%s. The exact specification of the demo vehicle is determined at the point that you sign up to the scheme.

text.name: rt_scheme_desc_natural_grazing
text.text: A scheme to encourage letting animals graze in a pasture without additional feed. The payment is intended to offset any loss of earnings. You will receive a bonus for each hour that your animals spend grazing in a pasture.

text.name: rt_scheme_report_desc_delayed_mowing
text.text: The report shows a list of farmlands and the amount paid out during the last evaluation.

text.name: rt_scheme_report_desc_crop_promotion
text.text: The report shows a list of farmlands and the amount paid out during the last evaluation.

text.name: rt_scheme_report_desc_reduce_bale_wrapping
text.text: The report shows a list of farmlands and the amount paid out during the last evaluation.

text.name: rt_scheme_report_desc_natural_grazing
text.text: The report shows the total amount paid out during the last evaluation.

text.name: rt_no_vehicle_room
text.text: Not enough space for deliver vehicles for the scheme. Make some room and try again.

text.name: rt_info_scheme_selected
text.text: You have signed up for the scheme. Collect any vehicles from the shop.
